name: Unfathomable Gateway
description:
Unfathomable Gateway is a fast paced game where you play as the bouncer for an eldritch monster party - only you must let them in if you care for your sanity. As time goes on, the horrors become larger and only more impatient. Shuffle blocks out of their way as fast as your mouse allows.

Play with your mouse, dragging the door blocks. Press space to navigate menus and to pause.

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
